Package gr.interamerican.bo2.arch

This package contains the declaration of the Bo2 architecture.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CompositePo<K extends Serializable & Comparable<? super K>> Deprecated. Just declare as PersistentObject.
DataCommand A DataCommand is a command object that performs a data layer command.
DetachStrategy DetachStrategy is a common interface for strategy objects that undertake the management of detached objects.
EntitiesQuery<P> Query that fetches an object for each row.
FastPoReader<K extends Serializable & Comparable<? super K>,P extends PersistentObject<K>> Interface of a utility that reads persistent objects.
Key Key of a persistent object.
KeyGenerator<K extends Key> Key generator.
ModificationRecord ModificationRecord contains information about the modification of an object.
ModificationRecordPo<K extends Serializable & Comparable<? super K>> PersistentObject with ModificationRecord properties.
Money  
Named An object with a name.
Operation An operation is a command object that performs a business operation.
PersistenceUtility<PO> Persistence utility of a persistent class.
PersistenceWorker<PO extends PersistentObject<?>> Persistence utility of a class.
PersistenceWorkerFactory Factory of PersistenceWorker objects.
PersistentObject<K extends Serializable & Comparable<? super K>> Each object that is stored in a data store is a PersistentObject.
PoDependent<P extends PersistentObject<?>> An object that depends by a persistent object.
Provider Provider is a class that provides the runtime dependent resources to a Bo2 class.
Query Query is a java wrapper around a cursor to the data storage layer.
Question<A> Question to the data storage layer that returns an answer.
ResourceWrapper ResourceWrapper is the common interface for all classes that provide runtime dependent resources.
Rule Interface for a rule check.
TransactionManager Abstraction of transaction manager.
Worker Worker is the basic interface for any runtime independent operation.
 

Package gr.interamerican.bo2.arch Description

This package contains the declaration of the Bo2 architecture.
Bo2 is an architectural framework aiming to facilitate model driven development of a reusable service oriented java business layer.
The Bo2 architecture is defined as a set of interfaces.
